reviewText:
This game is a an absolute gem, I picked it up today and haven't put it down.
If you're into casual, arcade style game play, then POPixel is going to be right up your alley.

Stunning and vibrant pixel art visuals. Cute and catchy music, it doesn't get annoying or repetitive. And just really solid, smooth controls and game play mechanics.

Total bargain at Â£1.43, I'll be gifting this to some friends.
